restaurants_bars.name: Xfinity Live!
restaurants_bars.description: A lively dining and entertainment complex located within walking distance of Wells Fargo Center.

restaurants_bars.name: P.J. Whelihan's Pub + Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: Great for pre/post game rate with a great beer selection and view of the Wells Fargo Center.

restaurants_bars.name: Chickie's & Pete's
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for their crab fries and situated just a short distance from the stadium.

accommodations.name: Holiday Inn Philadelphia Stadium
accommodations.description: Located within walking distance of the stadium with free parking and free WiFi.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott Philadelphia South
accommodations.description: Modern hotel located near the sports complex with average price and good facilities

tourist_attractions.name: The Liberty Bell
tourist_attractions.description: One of the most prominent symbols of American freedom, located just a few miles from Wells Fargo Center.

tourist_attractions.name: Philadelphia Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: Famous for its vast collection of art and the 'Rocky Steps'.

team_related_activities.name: 76ers team store
team_related_activities.description: Located directly inside of the arena, it sells team merchandise and collectibles.

options.description: Take the Broad Street Line to NRG station, which will put you directly at the stadium complex.
